text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Wow! What's everyone laughing at?<n>Did something funny
happen?! Tell<n>me!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Nothing really happened in particular...<n>But, you know how
both El and Opera<n>O performed a solo during the<n>concert?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Well, they started a debate over who<n>should be considered
the star of the<n>show, and then King Halo and our<n>class
representative got involved...

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: And this is... how it ended?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...Statusâ€”"Perplexed". No connection<n>can be found between
simultaneous<n>laughter and the process leading to<n>dispute
resolution.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
I agree. They've been at this for<n>about fifteen minutes
already. I expect<n>that any moment now they'll realize...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: For us, there's a more fitting way to<n>settle the score...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Hmph. It seems we are left with no<n>other options.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: That's right! It's time our legs do the<n>talkin'!

text_block_list.name: Everyone
text_block_list.text: Let's settle this in a race!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Heh, everyone's so full of energy.
